summary: A test suite that validates IAM resource handling through CloudFormation templates using mocked AWS services. It covers creation, updating, and deletion of roles, policies, users, groups, instance profiles, and access keys, and checks attribute retrieval and behavior under various scenarios.
business_intent: To ensure that IAM entities defined in CloudFormation stacks are correctly managed—created, modified, and removed—and that their properties and permissions behave as expected, providing confidence in infrastructure-as-code deployments.
